column4: could someone please help me with some nforce onboard sound card issues?
i have the driver installed (w00t) but having trouble activating it, i don't know how too.
does anyone know how to activate sound card drivers?
the ones you install from nvidia
ok, try 'sudo dpkg-reconfigre xserver-xorg'
go through and choose the vesa driver if you havent allready
would anyone happen to know how to activate sound card drivers?
i just installed the official ones for my onboard soundcard and i don't know how to activate them
what's lspci  say your sound chipset is ?
where in the printout does it say my soundcard?
i'll get the type again, hold up
are you still around?
yes
sorry was talking to someone
that should work fine then
what do you mean it doesn't do more than 2 channels
oh
go to terminal and type alsamixer
and adjust the 3d and amp etc settings
some of the outputs are probably just muted
sorta, but it shows more options. you can turn those options on in the "speaker icon" but it's easier for me to point you at alsamixer
it didn't work :*
